description:
▣ Chosen as Gizmodo's App of the Day (4/30/2012)

* * * 

Share your everyday moments with everyone around the world!


# Never forget that moment!
Had a really gorgeous lunch with friends? Or maybe the weather is just so perfect you want to take a photo? Whatever the reason, “pick” is here to make sure you always remember that moment! Post a photo, leave a comment and share those precious times. 
It’s really easy to design and decorate your photos too with filters, frames, stickers, brushes and more. Try it out today!

# Make new friends!
You can have even more fun with friends if you both use “pick”. You can even make new friends by “picking” other people’s photos and “following” the users you like. Of course, you can invite your Facebook and Twitter friends to the action too. Who knows? Maybe someone will leave a comment and “pick” your photos too!

# Choose the design of your page!
Many people will visit your page every day. There is no better way to thank them than to update those cover photos, title bars and menus to have them looking sleeker than ever

# Choose the posts you’re interested in!
Cats, dogs, cars, nature… We all have our favorites! With “pick” you can tag your photos according to the theme. You can also add your favorite tags to your “favorites” so you only see what you want to see. If there is no particular tag, why not start that trend with your photos? Tags allow you to connect with like-minded people.

# Travel the world with “pick”
See what people in other countries are up to in a flash. Whether its Thai people enjoying “Songkran” or Japanese people enjoying the cherry blossoms, you’ll find it here. Simply select the country of interest at the “Country page” and you can view moments from wherever in the world you wish. Travelling the world never came so easy!


So, do we have you interested? 
Download “pick” now and open your eyes to a new world of wonder!
We are all looking forward to your photos!
releaseNotes:
▣ 3.8.2
▷ Fixed bugs

▣ 3.8.1 (2014/9/19)
▷ Support iOS8 

▣ 3.8.0 (2014/8/13)
▶ You can now configure push notifications by type.
▶ Fixed problem preventing image browsing and uploading in some environments. 
▶ bugs fixed 

▣ 3.7.0 (2013/9/16) 
▶ New privacy settings 
▶ Easier to view other stories 
▶ Longer comments 

▣ 3.6.0 (2013/7/30) 
▶ New DECOmment feature! 
▶ Make your My Page more personal! 
▶ Invite your LINE friends! 
▶ Huge improvements to camera function 
▶ New country options! 

▣ 3.5.0 (2013/5/2) 
▶ Today’s Message! 
▶ Stickers in comments! 
▶ Design improvements! 

▣ 3.4.0 (2013/3/11) 
▶ Added a function to Invite Friends 

▣ 3.3.0 (2013/2/10) 
▶ Added editing functions for My Page 
▶ Added a new viewing option for the HOT PICK section 
▶ Enhanced animations and sounds for the Follow 

▣ 3.2.0 (2013/12/13) 
▶ Browse while uploading 
▶ Added a feature to edit your posts 
▶ Added a Favorite function 

▣ 3.1.0 (2012/9/7) 
▶ Block functions 
▶ Text-copy functions 
▶ New notification sounds 

▣ 3.0.0 (2012/7/12) 
▶ Added a Tag Page 
▶ Added a Country Page 
▶ New icons and Design
